page.title: 03FARMING
page.content: Crops are very important in the Inverkeilor area.The most important one is {barley}because there is a great demand for it to make malt for whisky and beer. {Oil seed rape}has grown more popular over the years as well because it is more profitable.Oil seed rape is mostly used for making vegetable oils and margarine. Other crops which are grown in this area are{wheat},{oats},{grass},{ {potatoes},{turnips}and{soft fruits } like {raspberries}and {strawberries}. In the past few years less grass has been grown and more cereal crops have been planted.
